text.section:
Allotments within appropriations for the activities and purposes contained in an enacted branch budget bill may be revised as follows:
For the executive branch, upon authorization of the state budget director at the request of the head of a budget unit;
For the judicial branch, upon authorization of the director of the Administrative Office of the Courts, or his designee; and,
For the legislative branch, upon authorization of the director of the Legislative Research Commission, or his designee.
A copy of the request and determinations shall be transmitted to the Interim Joint Committee on Appropriations and Revenue prior to the implementation of the revision of the allotment.

law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 387, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1994.
